hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# environment setup export CCPREFIX="/opt/cross/x-tools/arm-unknown-linux-gnueabi/bin/arm-unknown-linux-gnueabi-" export BUILD_DIR=$(mktemp --directory --suffix=".arm_cc_demo") . ~/.bashrc.d/crosstool-ng
#echo "==== current environment is... ====" #set
cd $BUILD_DIR cat <<EODF > test.c #include <stdio.h> int main() { printf("Hello, world!\n"); return 0; } EODF
arm-unknown-linux-gnueabi-gcc -o test test.c file test cd rm -rf $BUILD_DIR unset BUILD_DIR
